lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal converted only 4 of 19 break-point chances but rallied to beat James Blake, 3-6, 6-3, 6-1, Wednesday in the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Rafael Nadal converted only 4 of 19 break-point chances but rallied to beat James Blake, 3-6, 6-3, 6-1, Wednesday in the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
